text: (Nk’uko twohereje intumwa mbere yawe) ni na ko twakohereje (yewe Muhamadi) ku muryango (Umat) wabanjirijwe n’indi miryango, kugira ngo ubasomere ibyo twaguhishuriye (Qur’an), kuko bo bahakana Nyirimpuhwe.Vuga uti "Ni we Nyagasani wanjye, nta yindi mana ikwiye gusengwa by’ukuri itari we. Ni we niringiye kandi ni na we nicuzaho
